Description: Themes associated with resources derived from consortia activities
DependsOn: Component, Theme Name, Theme Display Name, Theme Description

Description: Machine readable name of the research theme. (e.g. compuational_resource, drug_resistance_sensitivity).
Human readable display name of the research theme. (e.g. Computational Resource, Drug Resistance/Sensitivity)
Themes associated with Grants, joined by uuids from the theme and grant table.
